entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 90
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
